name: Navattic
description: Load navattic.js without directly installing it in your application.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: img-src 'self' data:; default-src 'self' data: https://*.navattic.com; connect-src 'self' data: https://*.navattic.dev https://*.navattic.com http://localhost:3000 http://127.0.0.1:3000 http://localhost:8787 http://127.0.0.1:8787 https://app.posthog.com; object-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; worker-src 'self'; style-src-elem *;
